Sentencas: A glass system based on SiO2-B2O3-Al2O3-BaCO3-PbO2-ZnO was prepared and a sort of compounding was optimized to determine the composition with best performance named AF8.
Titulo: Characteristics of a SiO2-B2O3-Al2O3-BaCO3-PbO2-ZnO glass-ceramic sealant for SOFCs

Sentencas: The technical thermal expansion coefficient (t-TEC) is 10.58 x 10(-6) K-1 between 323 and 773 K.
Titulo: Characteristics of a SiO2-B2O3-Al2O3-BaCO3-PbO2-ZnO glass-ceramic sealant for SOFCs

Sentencas: The resistivity of AF8 is 1.95 x 10(4) Omega cm at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Characteristics of a SiO2-B2O3-Al2O3-BaCO3-PbO2-ZnO glass-ceramic sealant for SOFCs

Sentencas: The optimum sealing temperature range was 850-880 degrees C. AF8 glass sealant could adhere with electrolyte of yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) well and there were no perforative pores in the sealant.
Titulo: Characteristics of a SiO2-B2O3-Al2O3-BaCO3-PbO2-ZnO glass-ceramic sealant for SOFCs

Sentencas: The leak rate of AF8 glass was 0.81 x 10(-7) mbar 1 s(-1) cm(-1) at 800 degrees C tested by oxygen coulometric titration which was closed to the required value.
Titulo: Characteristics of a SiO2-B2O3-Al2O3-BaCO3-PbO2-ZnO glass-ceramic sealant for SOFCs

Sentencas: Around the sealing temperature, contact angle of AF8 on YSZ is about 110 degrees.
Titulo: Characteristics of a SiO2-B2O3-Al2O3-BaCO3-PbO2-ZnO glass-ceramic sealant for SOFCs

Sentencas: This angle can make them adhere well under a suitable pressure, and also avoids glass spreading freely on surface of the electrolyte.
Titulo: Characteristics of a SiO2-B2O3-Al2O3-BaCO3-PbO2-ZnO glass-ceramic sealant for SOFCs

Sentencas: All measured results approved that AF8 may become a practical sealant for SOFCs.
Titulo: Characteristics of a SiO2-B2O3-Al2O3-BaCO3-PbO2-ZnO glass-ceramic sealant for SOFCs
Characteristics of a SiO2-B2O3-Al2O3-BaCO3-PbO2-ZnO glass-ceramic sealant for SOFCs
